title: Chakras Watch Face
summary: Feel the power of chakras with this animated Watch Face for Wear.
description: Bring the power of colors everywhere. Selects for each color you want to encourage every moment of the day chakra. If you have a wear device, you can not overlook this watch face.You have the choice between 8 different designs, each a color associated with a chakra, for your day. This way will help you try to reinforce areas of the body that need.This application is compatible with:  - Moto 360 ( moto360 )  - Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )  - Huawei Watch  - LG G Watch R ( lgwr )  - LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )  - LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )  - Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )  - Samsung Gear Live  - Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1, 2 & 3 )  - Fossil Q  - TAG Heuer
descriptionHTML:
Bring the power of colors everywhere. Selects for each color you want to encourage every moment of the day chakra. If you have a wear device, you can not overlook this watch face.

You have the choice between 8 different designs, each a color associated with a chakra, for your day. This way will help you try to reinforce areas of the body that need.

This application is compatible with:
- Moto 360 ( moto360 )
- Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
- Huawei Watch
- LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
- LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
- LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
- Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
- Samsung Gear Live
- Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1, 2 & 3 )
- Fossil Q
- TAG Heuer
recentChanges: - Animations are added. Now it's more realistic!
